kickstart.post:
awk ' \ /^DHCPDARGS/ { \ printf("DHCPDARGS=\"eth0\"\n"); \ next; \ } \ \ { \ print $0; \ } ' /etc/sysconfig/dhcpd > /tmp/dhcpd
mv /tmp/dhcpd /etc/sysconfig/dhcpd
/sbin/chkconfig dhcpd on
